The small surveying ship warped in and started scanning the planet 
from its moon's orbit.

Gogolan: What... Hey, Ramiel... hey!!! Red alert! move the ship!!! 
there's another one in this orbit!!!!

Ramiel moved the winged ship swiftly, barely moving out the other 
ship's way.

Ramiel: What was that?

Gogolan: According to my readings... it was... the Ark?!?

Ramiel: The Ark?! It should be on earth at this time period, right?

Gogolan: It should... I think we should go check things out on the 
planet.

Ramiel: Yes... I have read multiples spark signatures. Things are 
definitely the way they should be.

The ship moved and entered the Earth's atmosphere.

Ramiel: Transformers of Earth, We are the Angelions. Send 
one representant of each faction to the following coordinates (Central 
Brasil). We shall present us further. Come unarmed. Anyone using 
agression will be punished.
